Although I am writing this review in 2019, an era when many young audience like to watch hi-fi films like that of Marvel's, this simple yet fun movie is sure a nice thing to watch. Built on cross border terrorism, it educates audience about its mechanism while showing a brave police officer's desparate attempts to stop it with many humourous scenes in between. Overall the story is simple and nice not to mention great acting and direction. Recommended watch for people looking for some serious issue based non animated film.
